pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Torchflower, 1 Magma Block, 1 of any log, 1 Bark Enforced Sproutling,  1 Empty Seed Packet, 175 Sun value.

pages.title: â›¨ Barrier
pages.text: $(#25228d)Torchwoods turn peas that pass through them into fireballs.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Immune to Fire. Illuminating. Burns or thaws peas that hit it. Deals Fire Damage to all zombies close to it. Burning peas do double the damage and have splash damage.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Torchwood and Snapdragon have become friends. They hang out at either the Tiki Lounge or the Renaissance Faire.
